term.title: pseudo-copolymer

item.text: An irregular polymer, the molecules of which are derived from only one species of monomer but which display a variety of structural features more appropriate for description in copolymer terms.

notes.item: Where appropriate, adjectives specifying the types of 'copolymer' may be applied to 'pseudo-copolymer'. The term statistical pseudo-copolymer, for instance, may be used to describe an irregular polymer in the molecules of which the sequential distribution of configurational units obeys known statistical laws.
